name: Anon's Neko Waifus
description:
Talk to cute neko girls and try to impress them. All of their reactions, both good and bad, will be recorded in your collection of unique cards. Strive for your best dice rolls, as you will be constantly tested on your personality traits

Enjoy a lighthearted romantic adventure with:

• 20+ Scenes
• 10 perks to unlock
• 60+ collectible cards to gather
• Voiced dialogue

Discover the Neko flavor of love. Engage in romance and adventure, and hope for the best when dice rolls. The girls will react to your mishaps and remember your witty comebacks. Good luck!



Welcome to a world where passion, desire, and the whimsical nature of love intertwine. Immerse yourself in the enchanting journey of "Anon's Neko Waifus".



You are Anon, an ordinary guy who, by chance, or sometimes thanks to his wits, encounters alluring neko girls. The story begins innocently enough, with a chance meeting at a workplace. Tami, a graceful neko with eyes that hold a glimmer of mischief, seeks your help in moving to her new flat. Little do you know that this encounter will unlock a door to an unexpected romance that unfolds with every touch, every shared moment.

Venture further into the world of dreams and glamour as you cross paths with Sara, an upcoming fashion model. Her elegance and poise are matched only by the fire in her eyes. Explore the intimate connection that blossoms between you, as the allure of the runway intertwines with the electric chemistry that binds your hearts together.



But let your thirst for adventure take flight as you encounter Niko, a spirited neko girl who craves the thrill of the unknown. Together, you'll embark on exhilarating bike rides, exploring hidden paths and secret treasures. Feel the wind rush against your skin, hearts beating in harmony as you share unforgettable adventures that ignite the flame of passion within.

Enter the world of nerdy passions and quirky conventions with Fia, a charming neko girl who loves all things nerdy.

Let the allure of love and the intrigue of romance with cute neko girls sweep you away
